nl.rug.nc.bicycles.bicycleStand.ui

Class UI

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.rug.nc.bicycles.bicycleStand.ui.UI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLI, GUI

    public abstract class UI
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class contains the message handling methods for all User Interfaces of bicycle stands.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UI.MessageType
      Specifies the the different message types: INFO, WARNING and SEVERE.

      • log

        public void log(UI.MessageType type,
                java.lang.String message)
        Shows a message to the user if its log level is higher or equal to the current log level. Logs the other messages.
        Parameters:
        type - The message type.
        message - The message String.
